BEP20 RAI is the 1:1 Raicoin backed toke: BEP20 RAI is the 1:1 Raicoin backed token on Binace Smart Chain (BSC), use this bridge to convert RAI to BEP20 RAI or vice versa.
You need to connect a web3 wallet first,: You need to connect a web3 wallet first, such as metamask, trustwallet!
Resend mint request to your web3 wallet: Resend mint request to your web3 wallet
Use the options below to create a new wa: Use the options below to create a new wallet or import an existing one.
When you create a wallet, a new Raicoin: When you create a wallet, a new Raicoin seed will be generated which is the master key to all of your accounts inside of the wallet!
Make sure you back up your seed, write i: Make sure you back up your seed, write it down, and keep it incredibly safe!
There is NO way to recover it after crea: There is NO way to recover it after creation, and all funds inside WILL be lost without it!
If you already have a Raicoin wallet, yo: If you already have a Raicoin wallet, you can import it below.
When you import a wallet, none of your e: When you import a wallet, none of your existing wallets or accounts are affected, and your seed is not stored anywhere besides in your local client.
Enter your 64 character seed from any Ra: Enter your 64 character seed from any Raicoin wallet to import it below.
Your new Raicoin wallet has been created: Your new Raicoin wallet has been created!
Make sure to write down your seed or sav: Make sure to write down your seed or save it somewhere safe, and never share it with anyone!
It is the master key to all of your acco: It is the master key to all of your accounts, and the only way to recover your funds in an emergency.
The password is used to encrypt the sens: The password is used to encrypt the sensitive parts of your wallet before storing them into the local database of browser.
You will need it to unlock the wallet.
Your new wallet has been configured, the: Your new wallet has been configured, the wallet ID is { id }.
Now you are ready to send and receive Ra: Now you are ready to send and receive Raicoin!
If you lose your password, you can alway: If you lose your password, you can always restore your wallet using your seed.
If you are BNB or BEP20 RAI holders, or: If you are BNB or BEP20 RAI holders, or have added liquidity for RAI/BNB or RAI/USDT on pancakeswap, please bind a RAI account to your BSC account here, then you can claim free RAI faucet every 24 hours.
The fund in the faucet pool grows second: The fund in the faucet pool grows second by second and works on a first-come first-served basis.
Calculated by formula M=X+Y/100+Z/1000,: Calculated by formula M=X+Y/100+Z/1000, where M is your daily max claimable amount, X is your BNB balance, Y is your liquidity of RAI on pancakeswap, and Z is your BEP20 RAI balance.
Transactions below this amount will not: Transactions below this amount will not be automatically received. Set to blank or 0 to receive all transactions.
Change if your wallet should be locked a: Change if your wallet should be locked automatically after you have not interacted with it for a certain period of time
Each account is allowed to create one Ra: Each account is allowed to create one Raicoin native token. The token address is same with the account address.
Set to 0 or leave it blank as no limit: Set to 0 or leave it blank as no limit
Allow the issuer to mint additional toke: Allow the issuer to mint additional tokens after creation.
Allow the issuer to burn tokens.
If you have added liquidity for RAI/BNB: If you have added liquidity for RAI/BNB or RAI/USDT on pancakeswap, please set up a RAI account here to receive reward.
Rewards will be issued randomly every 0: Rewards will be issued randomly every 0 to 48 hours, with average interval of 24 hours.

your seed and private keys are never sen: your seed and private keys are never sent across the network, or stored on any server in any format.
